name: theWoWsignal! music project
short_description:
The Wow! signal was a strong narrowband radio signal detected by Jerry R. Ehman on August 15, 1977, while he was working on a SETI project at the Big Ear radio telescope of The Ohio State University. NAPO or North American Astrophysical Observatory is now the successor to the Big Ear Observatory continuing the search for extraterrestrial intelligence. The Wow Signal Project aims to transport the numeric signal code to binary and export results to aalib. The wow signal originated in the constellation Saggitarius and embarked on it's mission approximately 2,600 years ago. 

http://www.discoveryinspired.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/WowL.jpg
